reviewText: I didn't know what to expect, but the movie was enjoyable and full of excitement, of what you didn't know will come next.
Title: Danielle Steel's Vanished

reviewText: No mini-series could measure up to Danielle Steel's, "The Ring." But Vanished hooked and kept my interest throughout the film. It is interesting that each of the " supposedly evil" main characters had a basic foundation of good will about him or her.I don't want to give away the story, but George Hamilton and his paramour used underhanded methods to take a child that they could love and cherish as his mother and father.I guess they rationalized the pain they inflicted on the Lisa Rinni character.Reasonably true to life.Fine acting and production values.
summary: Lots of scheming by basically wholesome people
Title: Danielle Steel's Vanished
